feed.title: Category: openhack | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Yahoo Open Hack India 2012, on August 11th, 12th at Bangalore
entry.content: I have already tweeted about the Yahoo Open Hack India 2012 which will be held on August 11th and 12th at Yewanthpur Bangalore. You can know more details and register from http://openhackindia2012hackticket.eventbrite.com. See you guys there!.
